result.eng: She was mad when she heard the work hadn't been done.
result.ga: bhí sí ar buile nuair a chuala sí nach raibh an obair déanta
result.orig: bhí sí ar buile nuair a chuala sí nach raibh an obair déanta
result.html: bhí sí ar buile nuair a chuala sí nach raibh an obair déantaShe was mad when she heard the work hadn't been done.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sí ar buile nuair a ċuala sí naċ raiḃ an obair déantaShe was mad when she heard the work hadn't been done.

result.eng: I hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.
result.ga: ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seo
result.orig: ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seo
result.html: ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seoI hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ am ceart agam le taḃairt faoi go dtí seoI hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.

result.ga: ní raibh an gríoscán glanta
result.orig: ní raibh an gríoscán glanta
result.html: ní raibh an gríoscán glantaThe grill hadn't been cleaned.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ an gríoscán glantaThe grill hadn't been cleaned.
